text:
Jetty didn't start when using the "Start Lenya" shortcut in the "Apache Lenya 
1.2" program folder. I was not able to capture any error messages or logging.  
Ater hitting the shortcut you can see a console window popping up for a 
second. Running the lenya.bat directly did work properly.
creator: dbols@osirion.be

text:
The reason is that the working directory is not correct. This is one of the 
properties of the shortcut.
creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
dbols@osirion.be
text: Yep, you are right, changing the working directory did solve the problem.
This problem should be resolved for milestone 1.2.
creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
